name: basic-info-site
description: By now you should know enough to be dangerous. There's *definitely* more to learn but you already know enough about Node to actually make something! So let's do it! You will be creating a very basic informational site that contains 4 pages: index, about, contact-me and 404. Keep in mind that the content of these pages isn't really all that important. So there's no need to spend a lot of time filling them up or trying to make them look pretty.
